entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [wasi] Extract minimal build infrastructure to WasmSDK #103038
    9.0.0
  • ILC: Virtual method resolution likely uses exponential algorithm #103034
    Future
  • IMemoryCache duplicating records(from enum key) in blazor wasm #103029
  • Unable to unload AOT compiled library of a highly multithreaded .net library using dlcose() #103028
  • [browser] Migrate runtime tests to WebAssembly SDK #103025
    Future
  • Application Manifest file not loading when having COMReferences #103022

Closed

  • Test failure: JIT/Regression/JitBlue/Runtime_55107/Runtime_55107/Runtime_55107.cmd #102978
    9.0.0
  • Implement Generic support for `UnsafeAccessorAttribute` #89439
    9.0.0
  • [mono] Implement generic support for `UnsafeAccessorAttribute` #99830
    9.0.0
  • MakeGenericMethod accepts type that violates unmanaged constraint #103035
  • Assertion failed 'IS_ALIGNED(addr, byteSize)' #102732
    9.0.0
  • System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.HttpClientHandler_MaxResponseHeadersLength_Test.SetAfterUse_Throws fails #101015
    9.0.0
  • [Test Failure] SocketsHttpHandler_HttpClientHandler_AltSvc_Test_Http3.AltSvc_ConnectionFrame_UpgradeFrom20_Success #101376
    9.0.0
  • Retry Counts are high in Http3 Tests #91017
    9.0.0
  • [HTTP/3] SendStreamLimitRequestsConcurrently_Succeeds times out #56000
    9.0.0
  • [Test Failure] SocketsHttpHandlerTest_Cookies_Http3.GetAsync_SetCookieContainerAndCookieHeader_BothCookiesSent #101377
    9.0.0
  • Timeout in System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.SocketsHttpHandlerTest_Cookies_Http3.GetAsync_SetCookieContainerAndCookieHeader_BothCookiesSent #101553
    9.0.0
  • [Proposal]: [Extension Method for Add seconds on TimeOnly] #103020
  • Test failure: JIT/Regression/JitBlue/Runtime_55107/Runtime_55107/Runtime_55107.cmd #102976
    9.0.0
  • Improve UX for publishing existing project as wasi #95345
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: System.Numerics.Tensors.Tests.Int16GenericTensorPrimitives.SumOfMagnitudes_MinValue_Throws #102975
    9.0.0
  • [browser][MT][hybridglobalization] Run HybridGlobalization MT tests #102305
  • [WASI] Best pattern for Native DLL Pinvokes using wasi workload? #97656
    9.0.0
  • [browser] Suport for OutputType Library #89577
    9.0.0
  • Console.ReadKey() not picking up ConsoleModifiers when reading ConsoleKey.Backspace #102511
  • [iOS/HybridGlobalization] RegionInfo instantiated by two-letter code is missing information #102937
  • Net 6 httpclient 401 large requests #100200
  • TypeLoadException when using a struct with an ImmutableArray containing the struct itself #103014

PullRequests

Created

  • Update osx-arm64, osx-x64, and linux-arm Helix queues #103053
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [interp] handle box + brtrue/brfalse pattern for byreflike types #103052
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • enable ProxySetViaEnvironmentVariable_DefaultProxyCredentialsUsed test #103051
    area-System.Net, disabled-test, 9.0.0
  • [workloads] Add net current to current names to make them match in net10 #103050
    area-Workloads
  • [workload] Use the same naming as net9 workload #103049
    area-Workloads
  • Fix handling of corrupting state exceptions #103048
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Fix shadow stack handling during exception handling #103047
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Baseline failing JIT/Regression pri1 tests #103046
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix compiling methods with explicit this #103045
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/6.0-staging] Merge #92958 and #93082 #103044
    needs-area-label
  • [mono] Fix `SwiftError` variable offset calculation #103043
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 9.0.0
  • Arm64/Sve: Implement Compute*BitAddresses APIs #103040
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • [WIP][NativeAOT] Disable `MH_SUBSECTIONS_VIA_SYMBOLS` and enable `-dead_strip` by default on Apple platforms #103039
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [browser] Fix: `HybridGlobalization` Invariant function differs from non-Hybrid #103037
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, os-browser
  • [mono] Fix typo in log message. #103036
    needs-area-label
  • [LoongArch64] Fix some failed CoreRoot R2R testcases. #103033
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [wasm] Fix emsdk check #103027
    area-Build-mono
  • [NO REVIEW] Update the CPUID and XSAVE logics for APX #103019
    NO-MERGE, area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution

Merged

  • JIT: Reset `optReachability` bitvec traits in IV opts #103042
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fill in FeatureCheckDataflow.cs assertions with issue links #102679
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Work around issue #102868 #102982
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [test] Update the reason why Verify_Generic_ConstraintEnforcement is not running on Mono #102939
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Weaken assert around folding constants #103026
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0-staging] Merge #92901 #102862
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • [release/9.0-preview5] [wasm] Stop setting problematic runtime feature switches #102943
    Servicing-approved, area-Workloads
  • Fix build on alpine arm64 #102953
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Simplify some non-generic CompareTo methods #101545
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Update Android and Linux-Bionic images #102928
    os-android, area-Infrastructure
  • Convert our CryptoKit bindings to use Swift structs at the boundary #102583
    area-System.Security, 9.0.0
  • Enable parallel test execution for QUIC and HTTP/3 and enable some disabled http3 tests #102996
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [wasm] Remove runtimeconfig.template.json from templates and provide it by default #102818
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 9.0.0
  • Ensure we call genProduceReg for the embedded mask node #103024
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add Compact API #102992
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • [Release/8.0-staging] Fix issue where the IPC server can fully consume a CPU core and prevent incoming connections #102530
    Servicing-approved, area-Tracing-coreclr, 8.0.7
  • [Release/6.0-staging] Fix issue where the IPC server can fully consume a CPU core and prevent incoming connections #102530 #103012
    Servicing-approved, area-Tracing-coreclr, 6.0.31
  • Remove `Thread::TSNC_IgnoreUnhandledExceptions` #103013
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix calculation of channel bindings hash in managed NTLM implementation #102565
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Security, os-android, community-contribution, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0] Removed unused sessions from SSL_CTX internal cache #102095
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Security, os-linux, 8.0.x
  • Add standalone GC out-of-date doc warning #103023
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Switch to AllowByRefLike naming in Mono as well #102516
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Use IsOSPlatform instead of checking for /proc #101547
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2466835 #102770
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Rewrite the corehost CMake system to be more "Modern CMake"y and less MSBuild-y #102475
    area-Host
  • Add three-stage enqueuer/dispatcher scheme to SocketAsyncEngine, ThreadPoolWorkQueue and ThreadPoolTypedWorkItemQueue #100506
    area-System.Threading, 9.0.0
  • Tensor validations, scope changes, and TensorPrimitives methods #103005
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/8.0-staging] Set version in ZIP local header to ZIP64 when file offset is >4GB #103006
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • [System.Diagnostics.DiagnosticSource] Implement metrics advice API #102524
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [ILASM] Added `/DET` flag for deterministic compilations #85344
    area-ILTools-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Convert `RuntimeHelpers.IsReferenceOrContainsReferences` to JIT intrinsic #103010
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, 9.0.0
  • Better createdump error message for single-file apps for heap or triage dump types. #102959
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Fix config binding generator ValueType defaults #102733
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, source-generator, 9.0.0
  • Remove cached cgroup values #102971
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Improve Json flushing #103015
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Make normal statics simpler #99183
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-coreclr
  • Re-write Android PBKDF2 one shot in Java #103016
    area-System.Security, os-android
  • Fix regression from RuntimeType.AllocateValueType rewrite #101137
    area-VM-coreclr
  • ILLink: Sweep .override for interface method if the .interfaceImpl is removed #102857
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Added SIMD path for Vector3, Quaternion and Matrix4x4 operations #99547
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [wasm] emscripten bump 3.1.56 #100334
    area-Build-mono
  • [release/8.0-staging] Remove noisy test #102610
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net, 8.0.x
  • In Windows host, use WriteConsoleW for stdout and stderr, and locale enabled print for file output #102295
    area-Host
  • Use PayloadReader in System.Resources.Extensions #102379
    area-System.Resources, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, binary-serialization, 9.0.0
  • Experiment - Remove space restriction from XarchIntrinsicConstants #102913
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Test CI #102967
    NO-REVIEW, community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Use BigMul in BigMul #100918
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Specify that `0x` is case-invariant in the Convert class #101876
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Implement IAlternateEqualityComparer support for Dictionary, HashSet, ConcurrentDictionary #102907
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Add Base64Fuzzer to the repo #103011
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add a regression test for double Content-Length header in HttpWebRequest #102989
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • ARM64-SVE: Saturating*ByActiveElementCount #102994
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Revert "Content-Length header not always returned when enumerating HttpContentHeaders" #102986
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • Move Disposal of QuicStream to the Http3Connection Prototype #102597
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Http
  • [wasm][wasi] Allow to build wasi in library mode #102806
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi
  • Fix WhiteSpace validation in HttpHeaders #102693
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • Support TLS Resume with client certificates on Linux #102656
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Add BFloat16 #98643
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • add hooks to debug OpenSSL memory #101626
    area-System.Net.Security, 9.0.0
  • Handle more than 64 registers - Part 4 #102921
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Integrate naot-llvm into workload manifest #101801
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 9.0.0
  • Add randomized allocation sampling #100356
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Avoid a few allocations in StringContent #103008
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • Enable CET shadow stack compatibility in `apphost`/`singlefilehost` by default #103007
    NO-MERGE, area-HostModel
  • ILCompiler.pkgproj: remove 'runtime.json' when DotNetBuildSourceOnly. #102908
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Reduce allocation in HttpUtility.UrlPathEncode. #102909
    community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Optimize HttpUtility.JavaScriptStringEncode by using SearchValues #102917
    area-System.Net, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • refactor: rename COMPlus classes to make a clear distinction with COM interop #102922
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add GC heap hard limit for 32 bit #101024
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V][x64] WiP: Passing empty struct fields #101796
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [Draft PR] Add user_events support for the native runtime events #102523
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [CI test] Enable JitOptRepeat unconditionally #103002
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Cleanup VARIANT marshalling and convert to managed #102498
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • AVX10.1 API introduction in JIT #101938
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Expose the Missing Workloads (not just missing Workload Packs) as MSBuild Items when workloads are missing #41387
  • WarningLevel is no longer set to match AnalysisLevel #41372

Closed

  • On dotnet publish for Mac, getting unclear error "error MSB4018: The "GenerateDepsFile" task failed unexpectedly... System.InvalidOperationException: Unrecognized AssetType 'resource' " #40015
  • Unable to build on new system #40840
  • SDK 8.0.1xx mixes Docker and OCI formats #41370
  • The Runtime version of “ASP.NET Core Runtime” and “.NET Windows Desktop Runtime” in .NET 9.0 Preview 5 SDK are 9.0.0-preview.6.xxx. #41303
  • [NETE2ESDK][MAC]Fail to test xunit/mstest project with NET 9 preview.4 SDK installed. #40194

PullRequests

Created

  • Respect DebugSymbols=false Fixes #41364 #41384
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #41383
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Ensure all template code files have UTF-8 BOM #41376
    untriaged, Area-Common templates

Merged

  • Fix Alpine Target RID #41381
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Publish xUnit test results (non-Helix) #41385
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Backport Containers Fix #38882 to release/8.0.3xx #41382
    Servicing-approved, untriaged, Area-Containers, 8.0.7
  • Fix getting path to full framework MSBuild #40934
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Blazor] Removes problematic system.text.json switches #41322
    Servicing-approved, Area-AspNetCore
  • Fix Aspire version to Preview 2 version #41274
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • Update .NET 9 p4 to p5 in the table #41369
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'main' #41366
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Use a more reasonable timeout for HttpClient operations for Container Registry interactions #41294
    Servicing-approved, untriaged, Area-Containers
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #41368
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #40932
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Add test #40548
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Blazor] Fingerprint all assets #41244
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • remove installer from version file #41316
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add implementation of Aspire service #41319
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Area-Watch
  • Enable the Respecting Item's Culture by default #41042
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Implement dotnet test help option #41142
    Area-DotNet Test, untriaged

entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Dictionary expressions #7822
  • Proposal: Semi-Auto-Properties; `field` keyword #140

  • Invalid implicit conversion from long to int #8185

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Lost ability to suppress CA warnings in Microsoft Visual Studio Enterprise 2022 (64-bit) - Current Version 17.10.0 #73838

Closed

  • Compiler should allow calling a property's setter if it doesn't affect the structure itself #73731
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35004.16 #73835

PullRequests

Created

  • Add tsx/jsx as recognized extensions for TS #73852
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Use a serialization compatible marker #73851
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Delay reporting of pattern-based using diagnostics #73850
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Async Streams, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.11 to main #73849
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to release/dev17.11 #73848
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge release/dev17.8 to release/dev17.9 #73847
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Update version for system.data.sqlclient to 4.8.6 #73845
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove semantic model keep-alive code in completion #73844
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Use EnableCodeStyleSeverity instead of AnalysisLevel to control new diagnostic severity behavior #73843
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Use correct get / set inside ref safety analysis #73842
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Update MicrosoftDevDivOptimizationDataPowerShellVersion to 1.0.803 #73841
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Upgrade MicrosoftCodeAnalysisTestingVersion to 1.1.2-beta1.24121.1 #73840
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Reduce project forks on solution open #73839
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Interval tree refactorings. #73846
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to release/dev17.11 #73682
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Reduce Linq usage in SymbolDisplayVisitor.CreateAliasMap #73793
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Also include cshtml in file paths to ignore #73834
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Workaround issue with invalid diagnostics reported via TS workspace diagnostics #73833
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Build interval tree from sorted nodes #73819
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Report diagnostic for `field` and `value` identifiers in property accessors where the meaning would change as contextual keywords #73570
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Generate ISymbol implementations at runtime to avoid type load errors #73675
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add ability to rewrite symbol references in BoundTreeRewriter. #73825
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Global options #73808
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Global options2 #73832
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Consider `params` and default values when comparing signatures #71380
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Lambda Improvements, New Language Feature - Default lambda parameters
  • Reduce allocations in PENamespaceSymbol.GetMembers() #73794
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix build host when only the .net 6 SDK is installed #73818
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Prefer implicit span conversions #73765
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • Fix exponential blowup parsing pathological files #73788
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix build warnings observed locally #73593
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Check duplicate interfaces only for metadata #73797
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Do not report warnings because there is non-array params candidate among applicable dynamic candidates. #73829
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2466077 #73415
    auto-merge

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Blazor] Runtime APIs to support fingerprinting #56076
  • Blazor Web App will not load webassembly component on some machines #56074
  • Perf regression: fortunes, multiple_queries, single_query #56073
  • Blazor multiple @page with parameters on Home component results in missing static files #56072
  • Strange unicode characters added to DOM #56069
  • Blazor WASM Msal race condition #56068
  • OpenAPI parameter descriptions are written to the wrong location #56065
  • SetLockoutEnabledAsync confusing comments #56061
  • Perf regression: plaintext, plainTextSansFilter #56060
  • Cookie causes an unexpected redirect. #56057

Closed

  • Perf regression: ApiCrudListProducts, ApiCrudUpdateProduct #56027
  • Perf regression: fortunes_spring, json_middleware, plainTextSansFilter #56025
  • Perf improvement: mapaction, mvc, plaintext #56058
  • Perf improvement: plainTextSansFilter #56059
  • NetMaui Blazor + RazorClass Library #56071
  • Blazor Should able to add Server/Static component to Child of Client component #56042
  • Error BLAZOR102 when using CSS preprocessing #39344
  • Blazor hybrid with WPF, memory leak. #55993
  • Perf regression: fortunes, fortunes, plaintext #56015
  • Perf improvement: plainTextEmptyFilter #56051
  • [SignalR - Java Client] Add support for Automatic Reconnection #56033
  • Why RequestTimeout WriteTimeoutResponse has never been executed #56055

PullRequests

Created

  • Annotate SignalR client for native AOT #56079
    needs-area-label
  • Remove dot that is added to URL #56075
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • gRPC JSON transcoding + Microsoft.AspNetCore.OpenApi #56067
    area-grpc
  • Fix SetLockoutEnabledAsync comments #56062
    area-identity, community-contribution

Merged

  • Fix milestones for July servicing #56078
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview6
  • [release/6.0] Switch to dynamic cert gen for tests #55811
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.32
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `d83fee1` to `a7f443b` #56006
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.32
  • [release/8.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `d83fee1` to `a7f443b` #56007
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.7
  • Update Selenium dependencies #56070
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview6
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `9b4993c` to `a7f443b` #55995
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview6

Updated

  • [Blazor] Consume fingerprinted assets in MVC and Blazor #56045
    area-blazor
  • Move Weather page to the Blazor Web Client project when using WebAssembly-based interactivity #55877
    area-blazor
  • Add codefixer to install OpenAPI package from extension methods #55963
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • Date only and time only is not supported in blazor change detection for parameters #55914
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Allowing for the content type/encoding to be specified for the main Result types #55888
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks, pending-ci-rerun
  • Fix for issue #54500: Middleware keyed dependency injection #55722
    community-contribution, area-middleware
  • Ensure that the hub client proxy generator correctly processes both explicit and inferred generic type arguments #55862
    area-signalr, community-contribution
  • Experimental revert of P/Invoke layer #55519
    feature-httpsys, area-networking
  • Fixes #55987 , input date does not work properly on interactive serve… #55990
    area-blazor, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-04

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Missing "appxrecipe" Maui Won't Deploy #22842
  • OOTB MSIX packaging fails to include Windows SDK #22838
  • Label HtmlText should support sub and sup #22837
  • [IOS][WEBVIEW] Unable to run an iframe in a webview #22833
  • [Android] Images not appearing initially #22827
  • Programmatic name for (+) increase reating/(-)Decrease rating button is not descriptive: A11y_.NET Core_RecipesAppMyRecipesNew_NewRecipe_Devtools #22826
    .NET 8 SR8
  • VS 2022, emulated device, Debug vs Release #22825
  • [Bug] The NavigationBar fails to refresh when the existing child of a TabbedPage is substituted with a different NavigationPage. #22824
  • When keyboard focus is on "Korean egg roll" recipe of my recipe list and press ENETR/SPACE key recipe is not opening: A11y_.NET Core_Recipes App My Recipes_My Recipes_Keyboard #22823
    .NET 8 SR8
  • When keyboard focus is on review slider, and we press TAB key keyboard focus is not visible: A11y_.NET Core_RecipesAppMyRecipesNew_NewRecipe_FocusOrder #22822
    .NET 8 SR8
  • Maui Blazor app freezes after pressing back button on Android. #22819
  • [Blazor] BlazorWebView and friends need a finalizer and probably also to implement IDisposable and block #22818
  • [ios] ContentPage.ToolbarItems is not currently being Garbage Collected (clicked event handler used) #22814
    Backlog

Closed

  • Flyout doesn't load the page after navigating back #19955
    .NET 8 SR6
  • PlatformBehavior.OnAttachedTo() is called twice during adding behaviour to a control causing a memory leak #22740
    .NET 8 SR6
  • Use `.windows.cs` instead of `.uwp.cs` in Essentials #22831
  • Reduce the number of calls to invalidate measure #22828
    .NET 8 SR6
  • Errors Restoring NuGet Packages, accessing Nuget and VS Marketplace once a MAUI Project was added. #22817
  • Missing Package Source Mapping in NuGet.config #15719
    Backlog
  • MudBlazor Dialog does not works in Maui Blazor. #22343
  • [Android][Handler/Layout Engine] Custom Entry with TextInputLayout won't respect layout width #21150
  • Support DisplayAlert from PresentedViewController #14258
    Backlog
  • MaskedBehavior from the Toolkit Behaviors is not working properly #22041
  • Sometimes .ttf files are missing in the application after the apk or aab build #22806
  • (iOS) Entrys ignoring textColor-property if text-property set via binding #22025
  • Bridge SCC at index must NOT be alive #22811

PullRequests

Created

  • [net8.0] Merge main to net8.0 #22841
    area-infrastructure
  • [net9.0] Merge main to net9.0 #22840
    area-infrastructure
  • [Android] TabbedPage in FlyoutPage in navigationPage does not fit all screen #22836
    community ✨
  • [net9.0] Enable back the failing Shell tests #22830
    area-testing, testing-reenable
  • Update project & solution templates #22816
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-templates
  • [Essentials] Add DateTimeOffset overload in Preferences #22815
    area-essentials, community ✨

Merged

  • [net9.0] Update versions for preview5 #22829
    area-infrastructure
  • [tests] fix F5 for Windows device tests #22835
  • Binding source generator #21725
    area-xaml
  • Reset opacity when view is being reused #22820
    platform/android 🤖, area-navigation
  • Fixing _loaded event firing logic #22807
    area-core-lifecycle, community ✨
  • [XC] Respects GenerateFullPaths #22808
  • Increase MAUI library supported version to 13.0 #22794
  • [net9.0] Merge main to net9.0 #22712
    area-infrastructure
  • Reduce the number of calls to invalidate measure #21801
    area-layout, t/perf, .NET 8 SR6
  • Added some additional testing assets to sandbox #22821
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing
  • [workload] fix missing files during the build #22804
  • [Windows] Set `CanDrag` and `AllowDrop` only if needed #22640
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-gestures, t/perf
  • Make sure the package source mapping is correct #22788
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • Fix <ApplicationTitle> encoding in maui-mobile template #22084
    area-templates, community ✨, stale
  • [Android] Fix RadioButton selection in Group #22787
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-radiobutton
  • [X] do not apply Bindings if DataType doesnt match #22056
    area-xaml
  • [Windows] Optimize getting default font size and font family values #22782
    platform/windows 🪟, area-fonts, community ✨
  • [ios/catalyst] fix leak in NavigationPage #22810
    area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, memory-leak 💦
  • [XC] Produce warning when x:DataType is inherited from outer scope of `DataTemplate` #22803
    area-xaml
  • Make sure ImageButton always has a background #22717
    area-controls-button
  • Adopt chromium methodology for determining tablet on Windows #22809
    community ✨
  • [Windows] Subscribe less pointer events in `UpdatingGestureRecognizers` #22781
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-gestures
  • [Android] Fix flyout behaviour switching exception #22453
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-flyout
  • [iOS] Fixed auto picker resizing after selection #20207
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-picker
  • [Windows] Improve performance in accessibility extensions #22698

  • Picker Attribute "SelectedIndex" Not being respected on page load - fix #22353

  • Fixes endless loop of HorizontalScroll #22628

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Cosmos: implement EF.Functions.CoalesceUndefined #33904
    Backlog
  • CosmosDB: ChangeTracker does not allow 2 entities with same ID but different PartitionKey #33903
  • Don't force NullabilityInfoContextSupport to be on #33901
  • Audit login / logout entries wrap every query in SQL Server Profiler log #33900
  • Runtime Relational Model created for both Model and RuntimeModel? #33897
  • Cosmos: implement proper source alias management #33894
    9.0.0
  • Cosmos: ReadItem should be used for Reload #33893
  • Deferred Dispose (maybe?) #33892
  • Optimize away Coalesce over non-nullable expression in SqlExpressionFactory #33890
    Backlog
  • Consider introducing nullability on SqlExpression #33889
    Backlog

Closed

  • Performance decrease (10 second delay) in database migration 8.0.0 vs 8.0.3 #33399
    9.0.0
  • Custom Sql exceptions for constraint violations, configured through Fluent Api #33861
  • Translate ToString on enums with number store types as a CASE/WHEN expression #33635
    9.0.0
  • Treat ToString as casting to string in the database #20604
    Backlog
  • No suitable constructor was found for entity type 'CollectionEntry' #33554
  • Let AddSqlServer/AddSqlite easy to configure the options from provider #33813
  • Query/Json: additional small fixes for JSON escaping #33886
    9.0.0-preview5
  • Nullability issues with `unhex()` #33864
    9.0.0-preview5

PullRequests

Created

  • Cosmos: translate Contains over subquery #33905
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #33902
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Remove unneeded Cosmos 3-value logic compensation for InExpression #33899
  • Clean up container management in Cosmos #33898
  • Cosmos: use ReadItem for more Find cases #33896
  • Work on Cosmos primitive collections, subquery and general query infra #33895
  • Add support for `object` in `SqlServerConvertTranslator` #33891

Merged

  • Translate ToString() over enums #33706
  • Set publishAssetsImmediately on post-build #33768
    tell-mode
  • Fix `unhex()` nullability #33870
  • [SMALL] Fix to #33886 - Query/Json: additional small fixes for JSON escaping #33888
  • Minor improvement of `SqlServerParameterBasedSqlProcessor.Optimize` #33758

Updated

  • Fix SQL Server translation of `IndexOf` #33876
  • Generate KeyValueFactory and related instances in the compiled model. #33887
  • Fix to #33073 - JSON columns throws Invalid token type: 'StartObject' exception with AsNoTrackingWithIdentityResolution() #33101
  • Translate non-aggregate string.Join to CONCAT_WS on SQL Server #28900
